resources.string: Go to Setting -> Security -> Device Manager and deselect Lock Scheduler from the list. Than uninstall.
Lock Manager doesn\'t save your pin or password. There is nothing we can do to unlock your phone.
Why the app need Device Admin permission
Lock Scheduler needs Device Admin permission in order to change the password, pin or remove them as it is specified in the actions.
Lock Scheduler needs location permission for the place condition.
Why Lock Manager needs access to WiFi info
Lock Manager needs access to WiFi information for the WiFi condition.
